RelatedSentence: , the leader in pharmaceutical serialization , track and trace and supply network towers for global Life Sciences , announced today the release of TraceLink Life Sciences Cloud version 5.0 with Product Track , the industry 's first Transaction History Management System for end - to - end Drug Supply Chain Security Act ( DSCSA ) compliance starting on January 1 , 2015 .
